snippet.title: Drums Rock - Official Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Drums Rock gets a new trailer, revealing the Pantera x Disturbed music pack is coming soon to the rhythm game. Check out the Drums Rock Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack trailer to see what to expect, which brings the Disturbed tracks "Down with the Sickness" and "Ten Thousand Fists," and the Pantera tracks "Walk" and "5 Minutes Alone." In addition, a new free update is coming, featuring a new campaign, two new skins to unlock, and a new feature called Flat Notes. The Pantera x Disturbed music pack for Drums Rock will be available on PSVR 2, Meta Quest, and Steam.
